featured.text: But whenever Dad 32 on going, she made sure that he brought a shopping list.
While it does have its share of resort hotels, shopping centers and good restaurants, and a smattering of museums, art galleries and night spots, its main attractions lie outdoors.
Mom seldom asked Dad to go shopping in the traditional market for her.
They have created a shopping environment where the needs of both mother and daughter are satisfied.

definition.zh_def: 購物，指購買商品或服務的行為。
definition.en_def: The activity of buying goods or services.
definition.example: I enjoy shopping for new clothes on the weekends.
